sentences.cn: “ 显然是搞阴谋, ” 雅克三号说, “ 再清楚不过了. ”

sentences.en: All design transparently, convenient for the file identification inside the bag.
sentences.cn: 全透明设计, 方便袋内文件识别.

sentences.en: Communicate regularly and transparently on progress, achievements and obstacles.
sentences.cn: 定期沟通进展 、 成就和障碍,并使其透明化.

sentences.en: First deceptively simply , it compels everyone to act transparently.
sentences.cn: 首先, 该守则要求每个人的行动都应透明公开.

sentences.en: Grid adopts some open standards, with its own service format to transparently access heterogeneous data resources.
sentences.cn: 网格服务采用开放标准, 以其特有的“服务”形式为异构数据提供一致透明的访问.

sentences.en: Grid computing can implement data - accessing transparently, seamless application service, and its throughput is huge.
sentences.cn: 网格技术能够实现数据访问透明 、 一体化应用服务 、 计算吞吐量极大.

sentences.en: InjectDLL module can inject a DLL into an exe file transparently.
sentences.cn: InjectDll模块实现了在执行文件中透明的插入检查点库.

sentences.en: Public security organ's manner is clear, fair, public, handles this document transparently certainly legally.
sentences.cn: 公安机关的态度是明确的,一定依法 、 公正 、 公开 、 透明地办理此案.

sentences.en: The book is remarkably accurate and transparently fair-minded.
sentences.cn: 这本书记述确凿，言辞明晰，见解公正。

sentences.en: The new feature enables data to be routed transparently to attached printers.
sentences.cn: 新功能可以将数据直接发送到随机相连的打印机上.

sentences.en: The optimizer transparently rewrites the request to use the materialized view.
sentences.cn: 物化视图作为复制品,提供了数据的本地访问.

sentences.en: The red brilliance of the claret shines transparently in our glasses.
sentences.cn: 红葡萄酒在我们的杯中发出透明的红色光彩.

sentences.en: The system was clearly not functioning smoothly or transparently.
sentences.cn: 该系统显然运行并不顺畅，也不明晰。

sentences.en: To force this agreement on the nation is transparently wrong.
sentences.cn: 把这一协定强加于全体国民显然是错误的。

words.tran_cn: 透明的；显然的；坦率的；易懂的
透明，透明度；幻灯片；有图案的玻璃
显然地，易觉察地；明亮地

trans.tran_cn: 明亮地，显然地，易觉察地
